DOC.brief_summary: Clomiphene citrate ( CC ) first-line therapy infertile woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) . Unfortunately , least 20 % PCOS result responsive CC . Structured exercise training ( SET ) diet successfully employ restore ovarian function improve reproductive outcome obese overweight woman PCOS . The current study aim test hypothesis short-term SET program plus diet intervention improve ovarian response CC CC-resistant PCOS patient .
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Structured Exercise Training Program Plus Diet Intervention Patients With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.detailed_description: Ninety-six PCOS patient consider CC-resistant responsive 150 mg daily CC randomize three arm ( group A , B , C ) . Group A underwent SET program plus hypocaloric diet two month , group B one month observation follow one-cycle CC therapy , group C underwent SET program plus hypocaloric diet two month receive one-cycle CC one cycle . CC always give maximal dose previously use . Clinical , hormonal metabolic data assess baseline intervention . Ovulation monitor ultrasound confirm plasma progesterone assay .
DOC.criteria: PCOS Anovulation Major Medical Condition Severe Obesity
